title: MOST KILLS ON ARAM?

replies.body: nah, I remember back when heimerdinger was good at aram and before they nerfed his team passive hp regen bonus with the healing reduction, if you got like 2 supports, a heimerdinger, an adc and a bruiser on both teams, games could go for over 2hours and having over 100kills on each or either side wasn't that uncommon. Breaking a double heimer siege was horrible, because the entire aram became trench warfare, where the team that tried to push forward would lose, and minions would get obliterated before they could reach anything, and so the game basically devolved into which team could focus fire and take a pick with a series of ults and then proceed to push a heimerdinger turret back.
